Title: Sr Staff Software Engineer
Requisition ID: 55531
Department: Marketing & Application Department
Location: Indiranagar, IN
Job Function: Software
Job Title: Senior Software Quality Assurance Analyst
Reports To: Manager of Software Engineering

Company Overview:
Renesas is a global semiconductor company providing hardware and software solutions for a range of cutting-edge technologies including self-driving cars, robots, automated factory equipment, and smart home applications. We are a key supplier to the world’s leading manufacturers of the electronics you rely on every day; you may not see our products, but they are all around you.
Renesas is a global, multi-billion dollar; publicly-traded company headquartered in Japan and has subsidiaries in 20 countries worldwide. Renesas is a dynamic, multi-cultural technology company where employees learn, mentor, innovate and thrive. Renesas is extending our share in fast-growing data economy-related markets such as infrastructure and data center, and strengthening our presence in the industrial/IOT and automotive segments. Our solutions drive products developed by major innovators around the world. Join us and build your future by being part of what’s next in electronics.
Job Description:
Renesas is looking for a highly experienced Software Quality Assurance Analyst to work on testing customer facing software and hardware/software integrations. This position involves developing a robust understanding of detailed technical requirements for the software and related hardware, development and execution of test plans and detailed manual test cases, collaborating on testing strategies, recommending areas for automated testing, analyzing test results, and debugging test failures and technical issues for one of Renesas’s fastest growing product lines. You will have the opportunity to directly impact customer experience through work on software products that enable feature rich hardware to shine. If you are versatile, inquisitive, detail-oriented, have a passion for diving into complex technical challenges, working with systems involving SW/FW/HW, and collaborating closely with colleagues, we’d like to hear from you. If you seek a place to shine with no artificial barriers, apply now!
Essential Functions:
Develop and execute detailed and comprehensive test plans and manual test cases on new features, product updates and internal and external software tools, and their related hardware.
Produce detailed bugs reports, analyze automated test results, assist developers and customer-facing teams in investigating the root cause of manual and automated test failures and customer issues, differentiating between product and/or test changes that need to be implemented, and provide testing result and coverage status reports.
Develop a deep understanding of the software products and systems under test as they relate to the hardware, firmware, comms, and similar technologies. Gather, document, and drive clarity on requirements from diverse groups including customers, application engineers, hardware, and firmware engineers to ensure the products we deliver meet and exceed customer expectations for quality.
Work closely with the Technical Lead for Test on testing strategy, test planning, and the development of testing best practices and processes for the team. Recommend which features would benefit the most from automated testing or assistive scripts or tools to improve efficiency and accuracy in the development and testing process.
Help mentor colleagues in product understanding, test design, test coverage requirements, and implementation of testing best practices.
Handle multiple, competing priorities in a fast-paced environment and manage tension between timelines, quality, and features.
Willingness to speak up, raise issues and risks, ask lots of questions, and provide improvement recommendations for products, test cases, test automation, and team processes.

Required Qualifications:
7+ years of hands-on Software Quality Assurance on complex systems - at least 5 years of that experience should be in testing software that connects to HW/FW.
Experience with electronics, microcontroller programming and bus communications, preferably in a power system, semiconductor, and/or integrated circuit domain.
Extensive experience guiding and mentoring colleagues including performing test case design reviews, test coverage assessments, product learning and technical training.
Ability to read and script in Python, or similar programming languages for the purpose of understanding automated test cases and analyzing automated test results to provide test automation developers and product developers with important insights into test failures.
Experience with unit, functional, integration, exploratory, and system testing involving SW/FW/HW
Understanding of JIRA, Software Version Control tools, Software QA best practices, and Software and Hardware development lifecycles
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail and accuracy, strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Must have highly developed written and verbal cross-functional communication skills, be a true team player ready to jump in to assist others in a friendly way, excited about learning, applying, and sharing new skills, and keeping up on the latest technologies and tools in testing.

Preferred Qualifications:
Java and/or ability to quickly pick up new programming languages in addition to Python.
Experience in DevOps, Git, HW/SW Test Station design and maintenance, Confluence, GitLab or similar technologies
Some automated testing experience and automation tool proficiency in Python, Java, Qt Squish, SmartBear Test Complete, or equivalent tools and languages
An ideal candidate will have a combined Software QA and Integrated Circuit/Power Engineering experience

Education:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Power Engineering, Computer Science, or similar

Renesas Electronics Corporation (TSE: 6723) empowers a safer, smarter and more sustainable future where technology helps make our lives easier. A leading global provider of microcontrollers, Renesas combines our expertise in embedded processing, analog, power and connectivity to deliver complete semiconductor solutions. These Winning Combinations accelerate time to market for automotive, industrial, infrastructure and IoT applications, enabling billions of connected, intelligent devices that enhance the way people work and live. Learn more at renesas.com. Follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and Instagram.
Renesas’ mission, To Make Our Lives Easier, is underpinned by our company culture, TAGIE. TAGIE stands for Transparent, Agile, Global, Innovative and Entrepreneurial. Our goal is to embed this unique culture in everything we do to succeed as a company and create trust with our diverse colleagues, customers and stakeholders.
We are committed to creating a diverse culture where everyone is included and feels a sense of belonging. For more information, please read our Diversity & Inclusion Statement.

titles: Full Stack Software Engineer - Product ops
descriptions:
About AlphaSense:
AlphaSense is a market intelligence and search platform used by the world's leading companies and financial institutions. Since 2011, our AI-based technology has helped professionals make smarter business decisions by delivering insights from an extensive universe of public and private content—including equity research, company filings, event transcripts, expert calls, news, trade journals, and clients' own research content.
Headquartered in New York City, AlphaSense employs over 1,000 people across offices in the U.S., U.K., Finland, Germany, India, and Singapore.
For more information, please visit www.alpha-sense.com
Check out what we've built so far:
1. The decision that matters -
2. India Office -

The Role:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Software Engineer to join our product analytics team.The mission of the Product Analytics team is to empower decision-makers and the broader data communities through trusted data assets and scalable self-serve analytics.
The selected candidate will play a pivotal role in establishing the client-facing analytical suite in both SaaS and Enterprise settings. This role also involves implementing the in-house Engineering platform on cloud infrastructure, configuring robust data pipelines, overseeing events infrastructure maintenance, and devising scalable solutions to fortify these frameworks
If you're familiar with Agile methodologies and energetic, with a 'roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes' attitude, we'd like to meet with you.
About the Team:
AlphaSense Product Development Organization is composed of great talent across Product, User Experience & Engineering – a team of creative technologists who drive the innovation, execution & delivery of our product each and every day.
At our core, we're here as a partner to the broader business – which we do by identifying customer problems, understanding market needs, and devising ways to deliver world class user experiences.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g. Statistics, Computer Science, Information systems, It or a closely related discipline)
3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer
Overall solid programming skills, able to write modular, maintainable code, preferably Python/Java & Javascript/React, graphQL, Angular, or Vue.js
Experience working with SQL would be preferred
Experience working with GCP and AWS is a plus
Experience with creating data pipeline and transformation of data with GCP and AWS
Experience with A/B testing and feature flagging tool is a plus
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and product development processes
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Understanding of observability and alerting tools like Prometheus and Grafana is a plus
Responsibilities :
Develop a Product Analytics platform for real-time event ingestion, storage, processing and analytics on BI tools
Develop a client-facing analytical suite within both SaaS and Enterprise environments - This would include handling front-end and back-end development.
Develop and maintain data pipelines required for the extraction, transformation, cleaning, pre-processing, aggregation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using Python, SQL,or other data technologies
Design / develop/maintain components of data processing frameworks
Focus on automation use cases, CI/CD approaches, and self-service modules relevant to data domains
Stay current on data engineering practices, evaluate new technologies, and adapt our strategy for sustained industry leadership
What we offer:
Playing a part in the story of a fast-growing company
Competitive compensation package
Interesting career opportunities and training
Very highly skilled colleagues
Lunch and recreational benefits
Occupational health care
If you meet the requirements and are interested in this exciting opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply.

Who we are

The Growth & Ad Platforms Engineering team is responsible for building Wayfair's class leading, data centric technology platform that optimizes and powers all of Wayfair's paid advertising. It touches hundreds of millions of consumers and drives billions of dollars in annual revenue. Our platforms allow us to scale our marketing efforts efficiently by automating key processes, interacting with ad vendors in real time and leveraging hundreds of terabytes of data and ML algorithms for optimization and effective decision making on millions of items in our catalog.The types of systems built by this team range from low latency REST APIs, to real time streaming systems to high performance large scale batch systems.

What You'll Do:
Take complex engineering problems, design appropriate solutions and deliver on them fairly independently with limited oversight.
Work on a variety of technologies - from large batch processes using Apache Beam and Spark, to event based systems using Kafka, K8s and Flink to robust REST APIs .
Architect and implement robust, well-tested services. Provide technical design and code reviews for peers within your team and across the broader Growth & Ad Platforms org.
Provide insights into opportunity areas for the platform, influencing priorities and team roadmaps in close partnership with Engineering and Product leadership.
Be a multiplier, mentor other engineers on the team and help them become more productive and implement engineering best practices.
Promote a culture of engineering excellence, up-leveling the technical expertise of engineers across Growth & Ad Platforms org.
What you’ll Need:
6+ years of experience in software engineering and designing systems at scale.
Experience developing applications using technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, SQL and React
Experience with Google Cloud Services such as PubSub, Dataflow and Dataproc would be a plus
Experience with Continuous Integration (CI/CD) practices and tools.
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to work effectively with engineers, product managers, and business stakeholders alike
Experience mentoring engineers and leading code reviews.
A track record of delivering in increments and learning as you go

Lead Site Reliability Engineer
Req id: 37046
Bangalore, KA, IN
Micro Focus (now OpenText) is one of the world’s largest enterprise software providers. We deliver mission-critical technology and supporting services that help thousands of customers worldwide manage core IT elements of their business so they can run and transform—at the same time.

The Opoortunity:
The Site Reliability Engineer is a new role at an exciting time for OpenText as we seek to scale and optimise our internal and external processes, transforming key services to cloud and delivering a customer experience that delights across all touch points. The initial focus will be on maturing our Software Factory, SaaS Fulfilment and DevSecOps continuous deployment delivery capabilities.

You are great at:
Apply problem-solving and structural thinking skills to solve ambiguous business issues or challenges, sometimes with limited information. Simplify complexity and help lead others to develop the same process thinking.
A natural collaborator, work with other engineering and design teams to consistently deliver great end-to-end customer experience across stages, channels, and other touchpoints in the customer journey.
Write high-quality code that satisfies customer needs and strives for simplicity, clarity, and testability. Participate in code reviews or use collaborative programming techniques to promote high quality business outcomes.
Promote a collaborative team environment and work closely with colleagues to achieve business objectives. Collaborate with stakeholders (business stakeholders, product owners, project managers, and end users) to understand functional and non-functional requirements.
Investigate and propose solutions to development and design problems. Participate in scope of work estimation and forecasting. Adhere to architecture, design, implementation, and security standards and best practices.
Conduct analysis to determine integration needs, and design and plan integrations. Implement unit and integration tests and conduct functional and performance testing where appropriate.
Develop reusable software building blocks to enable faster delivery. Improve performance of existing software by diagnosing and resolving critical issues.
Prepare technical documentation, including software design evaluation plans, test results, and technical manuals.
Ensure that baseline data is available prior to implementing change, so that metrics for improvement can be designed and tracked over time to measure success.
Help develop and embed the view that Cloud Transformation activity is not a one-off activity in a particular area, but a constant. Acknowledgement that the pace of change is driven by external factors, we need to ensure that we can constantly adjust to meet external drivers for an improved and updated customer experience working to delight not only external but internal customers.

What it takes:
We’re looking for someone who has a start-up mentality, who is excited to move fast, innovate and challenge assumptions.
The successful candidate will have a good balance of head-in-the-clouds and feet-on-the-ground pragmatic, focused on simplification approach, and who can lead by example.
Someone who approaches problems with curiosity for a best practice solution, leveraging market best practice views for standardization.
Someone who has proven experience in transforming businesses from on-premise hosting to public cloud, preferably using AWS and related tooling and Agile methodologies.
Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure certified DevOps Developer, Solutions Architect and Cyber Security. Proven experience using Terraform to deliver infrastructure, applications, and services as code on cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.
Proven experience in delivering monitoring solutions as “Infrastructure as Code” using Terraform, Ansible, AWS CloudFormation, Azure Resource Manager, Chef, Puppet, and similar technologies.
Expert in Microservices Architecture which make applications easier to scale and faster to develop, enabling innovation and accelerating time-to-market for new features.
Expert with Docker and container orchestration systems such as EKS, K8s, Docker Swarm etc. Proving experience of deploying and managing large, containerized workloads in AWS (ECS and EKS).
Site reliability engineers will also have to add automation for improved collaborative response in real-time, besides updating documentation, runbook tools, and modules to ready teams for incidents. Experience of designing and implementing CI/CD systems.
Strong experience with Serverless technologies including Serverless Spark, Lambda, DynamoDB etc.
Experience with distributed storage technologies like NFS, HDFS, Ceph, S3 as well as dynamic resource management frameworks (Mesos, Kubernetes, Yarn).
Proven experience in Technical Leadership in delivering innovative solutions able to collaborate with business leaders in building and running sustainable production systems, which can evolve and adapt to changes in a global business environment.
Energy, focus, assertiveness, and diplomacy: Knowing when to push an agenda and when to let a situation develop, rest, or advance.
Highly developed communication skills: Ability and comfort with working at executive levels.

Help develop and embed the view that Cloud Transformation activity is not a one-off activity in a particular area, but a constant. What it takes:
We’re looking for someone who has a start-up mentality, who is excited to move fast, innovate and challenge assumptions.

Someone who approaches problems with curiosity for a best practice solution, leveraging market best practice views for standardization.
Someone who has proven experience in transforming businesses from on-premise hosting to public cloud, preferably using AWS and related tooling and Agile methodologies.
Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure certified DevOps Developer, Solutions Architect and Cyber Security. Proven experience using Terraform to deliver infrastructure, applications, and services as code on cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.

Experience with distributed storage technologies like NFS, HDFS, Ceph, S3 as well as dynamic resource management frameworks (Mesos, Kubernetes, Yarn).
Proven experience in Technical Leadership in delivering innovative solutions able to collaborate with business leaders in building and running sustainable production systems, which can evolve and adapt to changes in a global business environment.
Energy, focus, assertiveness, and diplomacy: Knowing when to push an agenda and when to let a situation develop, rest, or advance.

Company Description

When you’re one of us, you get to run with the best. Job Summary
The Salesforce Marketing Cloud Senior Consultants are techno-functional members on the solution consulting and project implementation team, offering a powerful understanding of the Salesforce Marketing Cloud ecosystem and broader MarTech stack. They are client-facing collaborative business partners who own and lead workstreams, and deliver specific components of large, complex client engagements along with other teams and stakeholders. The candidate must be particularly adept at engaging customer stakeholders to envision and articulate solution design, and to distill business requirements into deliverable work products. In addition, the candidate will be responsible for leading all aspects of the Marketing Cloud implementation, including build, test, training, and launch activities.
Responsibilities
Leading the solution design process with Marketing Cloud including building journeys, writing queries, building data extensions

Your Role and Responsibilities
Do you have a passion for learning and applying modern engineering and testing practices? Are you a technically curious QA engineer? We are looking for passionate QA engineers to work on challenging workflows, creating test scenarios, test samples, and preforming tests related to IBM’s employee choice program. If you want to be a part of a team responsible for delighting hundreds of thousands of IBMers, read on.

Design, develop and execute test cases-based requirements and user stories.

Identify automation opportunities in different workflow.
Define and prepare test data and test environments to support testing.
Ensure that our software components are developed and thoroughly tested following best practices and are ready for integration into IBM’s best-of-breed solutions that help organizations improve their business outcomes in the global marketplace.
Ability to create & execute production like test scenarios.
Participate in Agile ceremonies i.e. sprint planning, estimation, etc.
Work with test management tools and defect management tools.
Participate in software development lifecycle, specifically test design, execution and debugging required to achieve successful implementation of integrated solutions within the product portfolio.
Perform web, API, UI, functional, regression, smoke, exploratory and end to end testing within an Agile delivery model.

3+ years of relevant industry experience.
Experience in system testing including test planning, assessments, test development and maintenance, reporting, defect triage.

Hands on experience in Automation testing frameworks.
Experience with all testing types: black box, white box, regression, integration.
Experience of working in Agile, Scrum, DevOps methodologies with global teams.
Experience in standard SDLC methodologies like Waterfall, Agile and Scrum.
Experience on different technologies (JAVA, REST API, C/C++, Linux)

About Business UnitIBM Software infuses core business operations with intelligence—from machine learning to generative AI—to help make organizations more responsive, productive, and resilient. IBM Software helps clients put AI into action now to create real value with trust, speed, and confidence across digital labor, IT automation, application modernization, security, and sustainability. Critical to this is the ability to make use of all data, because AI is only as good as the data that fuels it. In most organizations data is spread across multiple clouds, on premises, in private datacenters, and at the edge. IBM’s AI and data platform scales and accelerates the impact of AI with trusted data, and provides leading capabilities to train, tune and deploy AI across business. IBM’s hybrid cloud platform is one of the most comprehensive and consistent approach to development, security, and operations across hybrid environments—a flexible foundation for leveraging data, wherever it resides, to extend AI deep into a business.

Job Summary

The Salesforce Health Cloud Developer collaborates with the project team and the client to translate business requirements into working Salesforce solutions. The Developer has a deep familiarity with Salesforce platform configuration and customization and integrates Salesforce with other applications or data management platforms. As a member of a project team, the Developer mentors more junior resources, works with the Technical Lead to assign work to other team members and uses thought leadership and experience to solve the most difficult technical challenges on the Salesforce platform. The Developer has a range of experiences across the Salesforce Service Cloud and Health Cloud and has integrated the platform with other applications for customers either in Healthcare or in Life Sciences industries.

Responsibilities

Designs, develops, tests, and supports Salesforce Health Cloud implementations using out of the box Health Cloud data model, components, and add-on features

Develop customizations using Flows, Apex Triggers, Visualforce, Web Services, Salesforce Metadata API etc. as appropriate using code authoring tools such as VS Code, to satisfy the client’s business requirements.

Performs Salesforce configuration and administrative functions as required

Support the creation of customizations and integrations required to solution delivery

Implementation of Service Cloud features using Omnichannel engagement and CTI integrations

Develop self-service portals using Salesforce Experience Cloud

Configure the Salesforce application based on the business requirements

Develop and maintain Salesforce Lightning Web Components

Design and development of API-driven or Web Service driven system integration on Salesforce platform

Experience in designing bulk data migration mechanisms on Salesforce

Apply best practices and experience to build Salesforce applications.

Develop estimates for projects

Work closely with other developers in the team, business analyst, QA analyst and project managers.

Research Salesforce capabilities as needed to suit business requirements, and provide gap analysis

Ability to migrate metadata between Salesforce environments using Jenkins, GitHub, change sets and other tools as needed.

Skills in Angular JS, HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, jQuery is a plus.

Skills and Qualifications

Required

At least 5+ years in a consulting function

Education: Bachelor’s Degree (Computer Science)

Minimum 4 years of application design and development experience

At least two end to end implementations engagements on Health Cloud, including deep understanding of different Health Cloud Data Models and add-on features

Implementation experience of Service Cloud, Omnichannel engagement and CTI integrations

Experience in implementing self-service portals on Experience Cloud

Minimum 3 years of experience developing and customizing Salesforce application using Flows, APIs, Apex, SOQL, Visualforce and Lightning Web Components

Experience of managing implementation with IDE Tools like Eclipse, VS Code, Workbench, Data Loader etc.

2+ years of working with clients and vendors developing solutions and supporting projects from requirements gathering to release management

Experience integrating Salesforce with other applications

Manage multiple assignments and deadlines

For consultants based outside of India, willingness to travel up to 80%

Salesforce Service Cloud Certification

Salesforce Platform Developer I certification

Salesforce Platform Developer II certification

Preferred

At least 5+ years in a consulting function

Salesforce Accreditation for Health Cloud

Provide 2nd-level support and respond to network-related incidents and requests.

Set up and manage VLANs and Access points.
Monitor network performance and assist in optimizing network configurations.
Design, implement, and manage security infrastructure to safeguard the company's data and systems.
Develop and execute incident response plans in the event of security breaches.
Investigate security incidents and provide detailed reports.
Conduct regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing.
Develop and implement strategies to address identified vulnerabilities.
Maintain network documentation and reporting.
Gain hands-on experience in network security practices and protocols.

Strong understanding of networking concepts and protocols, including strong knowledge of the ISO model.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
Proven experience in a similar role, with a focus on network and cyber security.
Familiarity with industry compliance standards and regulations.
Experience with security tools and technologies.
Knowledge of emerging cyber threats and trends.
Knowledge of Endpoint Security.
Experience with access point management, Network troubleshooting, Routing, and Subnetting.

Preference will be given to candidates with certification in networking like CCNP, CISSP, CISM

WHO YOU ARE:
You are a seasoned professional with an extensive background in networking, particularly with a specialization in Cisco technologies. You possess a proven track record of designing, implementing, and maintaining complex network architectures that align with organizational goals. You have experience with cloud network technologies such as AWS. You possess exceptional problem-solving skills allowing you to swiftly diagnose and resolve intricate network issues, minimizing downtime and ensuring seamless operations. Your proficiency in designing scalable and resilient network solutions allows future growth and technology advancements for Zinnia.
WHAT YOU'LL DO:
As a Senior Network Engineer you play a pivotal role in managing and optimizing Zinnia's network infrastructure. Daily, your responsibilities encompass a range of technical tasks aimed at ensuring the reliability, and performance of our network. This includes:
Network Design and Planning - Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and plan network architecture, taking into consideration requirements for scalability, redundancy, and security.
Configuration and Maintenance - Configuring and maintaining network devices such as Cisco ACI datacenter, ISR & ASR Router, 3850 L3 access layer switches, Meraki Wireless, Checkpoint firewalls, and Citrix Netscaler load balancers. Ensuring that all network components are correctly set up and updated with the latest firmware and patches.
Troubleshooting - Identifying and resolving network issues and disruptions, whether related to hardware, software, or connectivity problems. Utilizing CLI or diagnostic tools to analyze and address performance bottlenecks or connectivity outages.
Performance Optimization - Monitoring network performance with ACI dashboard or Solarwinds, analyzing data traffic patterns, Utilizing Netflow and making necessary adjustments to optimize bandwidth usage and ensure smooth data flow across the network.
Project Management - Overseeing the planning and execution of network projects, such as network expansions or hardware refresh, or technology upgrades, ensuring they are completed within the specified timeframes during approved maintenance windows.
Documentation - Maintaining accurate documentation of the network infrastructure, configurations, and changes. Utilize Visio to maintain accurate network diagrams.
Vendor Collaboration - Interacting with network equipment vendors, service providers, and other external partners to manage contracts, negotiate pricing, and stay updated on the latest industry trends and technologies.
Emergency Response - Participate in on-call for critical network incidents that require immediate attention, even outside of regular working hours, to minimize downtime and maintain business continuity.
WHAT YOU'LL NEED:
Should have 5-8 years IT experience with strong expertise in Network Engineering domain.
Knowledgeable with Cisco network operating systems. IOS, NX-OS, ACI
Experience with Cisco campus switches, 3850, 4500, Catalyst 9000 series. – L3 Switching, HSRP, 802.1Q trunking.
Experience with Meraki wireless
Experience with Cisco ACI and Nexus 9K datacenter
Experience with Cisco ASR & ISR routers
Routing protocols – OSPF, BGP in multivendor environments, and EIGRP
Checkpoint Firewalls – familiarity with Security Policy, Application control, Site-to-Site VPN, Cluster XL
Experience with AWS networking, including VPC and Direct Connect
Familiarity with 802.1X Port-Based Authentication in a Cisco environment
Windows DHCP service configuration
Network Monitoring - Solarwinds
Bonus Points:
Zscaler
Cisco ISE
Citrix Netscaler
CCNA or higher certification desired
Qualifications
Should have Post graduate degree with Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or MBA qualification from reputed institutes.
WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?
We're looking for the best and brightest innovators in the industry to join our team. At Zinnia, you collaborate with smart, creative professionals who are dedicated to delivering cutting-edge technologies, deeper data insights, and enhanced services to transform how insurance is done. Visit our website at www.zinnia.com for more information. Apply by completing the online application on the careers section of our website. Venture CTO
About Blenheim Chalcot
Blenheim Chalcot is the UK's leading digital venture builder. We invest more than just funds, we invest our knowledge and experience, our ideas and infrastructure. Our ventures are at the forefront of a multitude of industries being disrupted digitally, including FinTech, EdTech, GovTech, Media, Sport, Charity and more. Ventures we have built range from ClearScore to Agilisys and even the Rajasthan Royals IPL cricket team. All our 20+ portfolio companies have been incubated and launched by us and now have total sales of over £0.5bn and more than 3,000 employees. Our assets under management stand at greater than £1.5bn.
As the Venture CTO, your pivotal role involves leading technology strategy and overseeing technology delivery across one or two of our portfolio companies. Your responsibilities include guiding engineering operations, platform management, and product development teams. Your focus will be on driving innovation and efficiency, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions that align with our business objectives. A key part of your role is to provide strategic leadership and direction, optimizing processes to enhance performance.
In this dynamic environment, you will manage, develop, and expand a team of skilled engineers, cultivating an atmosphere of collaboration, innovation, and growth within a product-centric framework. With your robust background in development, you are expected to spearhead the development of advanced B2B Enterprise SaaS products, fostering a culture that values technical excellence and continual enhancement.
A critical aspect of your role is to identify and monitor key business risks, addressing the evolving engineering requirements of the business. Your oversight of project activities and deliverables will be instrumental in ensuring coherence with the overarching departmental and business strategies. This role demands a strategic mindset and a commitment to maintaining alignment with our vision, pushing the boundaries of technological advancement in our portfolio companies.
Responsibilities:
Business Acumen & Leadership:
Understand the business goals, industry trends, and market demands to guide technical decisions that align with our strategic vision.
Develop a clear roadmap and technical strategy that supports both immediate goals and long-term business growth.
Operations & Program Management:
Design and implement efficient engineering operations, platforms development and support optimising processes to enhance productivity, quality, and cross-functional collaboration, especially across Data Science and IT Infrastructure practices.
Oversee end-to-end program management, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and in alignment with business objectives.
Team Building & Leadership:
Recruit, mentor, and lead a dynamic team of software engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.
Provide technical leadership, guidance, and growth opportunities to team members, shaping them into future technical leaders.
Product Development & Innovation:
Leverage your development background to guide the architecture, design, and implementation of robust and scalable B2B Enterprise SaaS products.
Champion innovative solutions, keeping abreast of emerging technologies and industry best practices to drive product excellence.
Empathy & Values:
Uphold our core values, fostering an inclusive and diverse work environment that promotes collaboration, respect, and shared success.
Demonstrate empathy in team interactions, creating an environment where team members feel valued and supported.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in software development, frameworks and platforms, along with low-code/no-code solutions
Expertise in software architecture and design patterns, with the ability to guide technical decisions for complex systems.
Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to lead troubleshooting efforts and provide technical guidance to the team.
Must have:
8-12 years experience in technology leadership roles
Proven experience in engineering management, including team leadership, talent development, and performance management.
Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage priorities, resources, and stakeholder expectations.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, both technical and non-technical, to effectively collaborate and convey complex concepts.
Ability to align technical decisions with business goals and make strategic recommendations.
Passion for continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends and technologies in software development and product management.
Track record of successfully delivering B2B Enterprise SaaS products, demonstrating a deep understanding of product development lifecycle, will be a massive advantage.

Graduation or Above in Technological or relevant field.

Job Title
Senior Test Automation Engineer
Job Description
Position Summary
You will be responsible for a wide range of QA areas including creation of test plans, scripts, performance plans, and automation of those into DevOps pipelines for continuous testing of high level control software platforms and applications. As a member of an agile team working with Sr. Developers, Architects, and Integration Engineers, you participate in various product development and project specific projects. You can work independently and take responsibility for testing coverage of the SDLC from test plan, reporting, and release validation. You will also coach and train others on testing best practices and standards, continuously evaluating new techniques and technologies to improve the organizations quality through a customer-centric approach.
Essential Functions (Job Duties and Responsibilities)
Solid understanding of duties performed within entire software development life cycle, tools, and language(s) to include:
Collaborate with Product Owners/BA’s/Architects in refinement and defining story acceptance criteria for controls-based software utilized in automated systems for material movement

The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) team can provide you the opportunity to build and operate a suite of massive scale, integrated cloud services in a broadly distributed, multi-tenant cloud environment. OCI is committed to providing the best in cloud products that meet the needs of our customers who are tackling some of the world’s biggest challenges.
We offer unique opportunities for smart, hands-on engineers with the expertise and passion to solve difficult problems in distributed highly available services and virtualized infrastructure. At every level, our engineers have a significant technical and business impact designing and building innovative new systems to power our customer’s business critical applications.
What is Security Products Group at OCI?
OCI Security Products Group is building comprehensive product portfolios to protect customers’ cloud environments with innovative approaches and hyperscale efficiency. Our core security pillars are: customer isolation, data encryption, security controls, visibility. Our vision is to build the most secure cloud environment for our customers to build their applications confidently on top of OCI. We are making strategic decision to heavily invest on detecting system vulnerabilities and threat activities, correlate and analyze problems, then remediate, notify and block attacks from malicious actors against customer cloud environment.
We offer a rich set of services to help our customer to secure their data, flexible access to their environment, detect the vulnerabilities and treats in their environment, source code, applications and containers, take remediations to protect customers based on the industry best practice such as CVE and CIS. Our solutions will ensure customers confidently build their business in Oracle Cloud.
https://www.oracle.com/cloud/products.html

Who are we looking for?
We are looking for engineers with distributed systems experience. You should have experience with the design of major features and launching them into production. You’ve operated high-scale services and understand how to make them more resilient. You work on most projects and tasks independently. You have experience working with services that require data to travel long distances, but have to abide by compliance and regulations.
The ideal candidate will own the software design and development for major components of Oracle’s Cloud Infrastructure. You should be both a rock-solid coder and a distributed systems generalist, able to dive deep into any part of the stack and low-level systems, as well as design broad distributed system interactions. You should value simplicity and scale, work comfortably in a collaborative, agile environment, and be excited to learn.
What are the biggest challenges for the team?
The biggest challenges for the team are reliability, performance and keep up in cybersecurity space. The dynamic and fast growth of the business is driving us to improve the ability of our systems to scale out and handle traffic patterns with full coverage that are several orders of magnitude greater than what we can support today.
We understand that software is living and needs investment. The challenge is making the right tradeoffs, communicating those decisions effectively, and crisp execution.
We need engineers who can build services that can reliably protect our customer cloud environment. We need engineers who can figure out how we can keep up our solution in a fast pace to securely protect our customers. We need engineers who can build services that enable us to offer even more options to customers and contribute to the overall growth of Oracle Cloud.
Required Qualifications
BS or MS degree in Computer Science or relevant technical field involving coding or equivalent practical experience
10+ years of total experience in software development
Demonstrated ability to write great code using Java, GoLang, C#, or similar OO languages
Proven ability to deliver products and experience with the full software development lifecycle
Experience working on large-scale, highly distributed services infrastructure
Experience working in an operational environment with mission-critical tier-one livesite servicing
Systematic problem-solving approach, strong communication skills, a sense of ownership, and drive
Hands-on experience developing services on a public cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Azure, Oracle)
Experience designing architectures that demonstrate deep technical depth in one area, or span many products, to enable high availability, scalability, market-leading features and flexibility to meet future business demands
Preferred Qualifications
Building continuous integration/deployment pipelines with robust testing and deployment schedules
Strong knowledge of databases (SQL and NoSQL)
Strong knowledge of Computer Networking (OSI layers, HTTP, DNS, TCP/IP, DHCP, Routers, Gateways, Subnets, etc.)
Knowledge of Linux internals, Linux/Unix troubleshooting skills
Experience with Kafka, Apache Spark, Lucene and other big data technologies
Able to effectively communicate technical ideas verbally and in writing (technical proposals, design specs, architecture diagrams and presentations)
Experience with hiring, mentorship and raising the talent bar across the organization

Financial Close Manager provides the solution with a single platform that seamlessly automates and controls the whole financial close, which allows one to capture all the information and documentation one needs to certify general ledger account balances for the close period – and streamline one close while showing consistent levels of control.

We have developed an application that utilizes Large language models, lang-chain, and vectorDB to respond to astrology-related queries and present various astrology charts comprehensively.

Project Requirement:
Project Title: ChatGPT Query Interface
1. Overview
This project aims to develop a web application that allows users to submit queries to ChatGPT and receive responses. The application will consist of an Angular-based frontend and a Spring Boot backend.
2. Functional Requirements
2.1 Frontend (Angular)
User Interface
A clean and user-friendly interface.
An input field for users to enter their queries.
A submit button to send the query to the backend.
A display area to show the response from ChatGPT.
Responsiveness
The UI should be responsive and work well on both desktop and mobile devices.
2.2 Backend (Spring Boot)
REST API
An API endpoint to receive queries from the frontend.
Logic to process the query and connect with ChatGPT.
An API endpoint to send the response back to the frontend.
ChatGPT Integration
Implement logic to communicate with ChatGPT's API.
Handle request and response formatting.
